workflow.name: Automated course registration evaluation with AI, Gmail, and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
üìå Description

Automate your course enrollment process with this workflow that handles student submissions, evaluates eligibility, and sends acceptance or rejection emails ‚Äî all without manual effort. It's perfect for instructors managing multi-week technical courses who want to streamline onboarding and communication.

‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

üì• Captures student registration data via an n8n Form Trigger

üìä Evaluates responses (e.g., checks programming background & availability)

üì§ Sends automated, personalized acceptance or rejection emails based on criteria

üìù Logs submission outcomes for review

üì® Optionally stores records in Google Sheets, Airtable, or a database (customizable)

üõ†Ô∏è Set Up Steps

üîó Connect Gmail (or your preferred email service)

‚úÖ Add your course filtering logic to the decision node (simple JSON rules)

üìÑ Customize email templates (plain or HTML)

üß™ Test the flow with sample submissions

‚è±Ô∏è Setup Time: 10‚Äì15 minutes (depending on integrations)

üîê Notes

No hardcoded API keys used ‚Äì all credentials must be set up using the n8n credential system

Sticky notes inside the workflow provide detailed setup and customization tips

Easily extendable to add payment links, WhatsApp alerts, or CRM integration

parameters.formTitle: API testing and Automation Mastery Program - Enrollment Form

values.html:
API Testing & Automation Training Enrollment

Please complete the form below to enroll in our comprehensive hands-on training program focused on API Testing & Automation using Postman and RestAssured.

üìö Course Overview

  • Schedule: 3 days per week
  • Sessions: 2 recorded Zoom sessions daily (1.5 hours each)
  • Total Weekly Time: ~5+ hours/week
  • Content Focus: Demo projects only (no real-world projects)
  • Certification: No certificate ‚Äì focus is on practical skills

üß† Course Content

  • üîπ Introduction to APIs & API Testing Fundamentals
  • üîπ API Testing and Automation using Postman
  • üîπ API Test Automation using Newman (Postman CLI Runner)
  • üîπ API Testing and Automation using RestAssured (Java)
  • üîπ Data-driven Testing & Environment Variables
  • üîπ API Testing with Cucumber (BDD Framework)
  • üîπ CI/CD Integration for API Automation (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.)
  • üîπ Generating Professional Reports
  • üîπ Version Control with Git & GitHub

üí≥ Payment Structure

  • API, Performance, Database & Security Courses: Full payment upon completion
  • Web, Mobile & AI Automation Courses:
    • 50% after the first month
    • Remaining 50% at course completion
  • Risk-YOUR_OPENAI_KEY_HERE: Cancel anytime within the first month ‚Äì no fees

‚úÖ Requirements for Enrollment

  • Must have basic knowledge of any programming language (preferably Java)
  • If you don‚Äôt have this background, please watch the first 60 videos of this YouTube Programming Basics Playlist before enrolling.
  • Completion of all assigned projects and tasks by deadlines
  • Active participation in sessions and assignments
  • Failure to meet requirements may affect future course access

üéÅ Free Mentorship

Have questions or need personalized guidance? Connect on LinkedIn:

Shady Ahmed ‚Äì LinkedIn

‚è≥ Course Duration

2 to 3 months depending on pace and availability.

üí¨ Ready to get started? Fill out the form below to begin your journey into professional API automation.
© 2025 Shady Ahmed | Testing Automation Instructor

values.fieldLabel: Do you have basics of any programming language?
I commit to 3 days per week for 2-3 months

values.option: I agree to follow all deadlines and complete assigned tasks/projects

parameters.content:
### Student Enrollment










This workflow starts **automatically** when a new student submits the enrollment form for the training program.

assignments.name: user_context
assignments.value: ={{ $json['Full Name'] }}, {{ $json['Email Address'] }}, {{ $json['WhatsApp Number'] }}, {{ $json['Do you have basics of any programming language?'] }}, {{ $json['Terms and Conditions'] }}

options.systemMessage:
üì® Enrollment Status Notification

{{#if $json.output.accepted}}
‚úÖ {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.name }} has been accepted into the course.
{{else}}
‚ùå {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.name }} was not accepted into the course at this time.
{{/if}}

üìÑ Student Details

Name: {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.name }}

Email: {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.email }}

WhatsApp: {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.whatsapp }}

Programming Basics: {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.has_basics }}

Availability: {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.availability }}

üì¨ Email Summary

    {{#if $json.output.accepted}}
  • Acceptance Email: Sent successfully to {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.email }}
    • {{else}}
  • Rejection Email: Sent to {{ $('Combine User Data').item.json.user_context.email }}
    • {{/if}}
  • Notification processed automatically based on form input.
Best regards,
Shady Ahmed
Automation Instructor
